messageBody:
There may be several ways of getting at what you want. Before I
confuse the issue, however, are you looking for simplicity of code, or
efficiency? How expensive is creating a new SimpleJdbcTemplate?

David

On Fri, Mar 26, 2010 at 6:27 AM, Tom Corcoran <boardtc@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks for the clarification. Is there a way then to create a
> SimpleJdbcTemplate, which uses an injected DataSource, once for use by the
> test class? @BeforeClass is static so it can't be done in there. Or do
> people just do it in @Before and have it re instanced each time?
>
>
> David Saff wrote:
>>
>> It's just not possible to set an instance field of an object before
>> its constructor has completed. Â This limitation will affect all
>> extensions.
